ValidationRule.description: Alerts users that when data is missing in fields that are used to populate info into the welcome email.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(Application_Status__c, "Setup Complete"), ISBLANK(Dedicated_Sale_Referral_Number__c),
OR( RecordType.Name = "MDP- ISP Exclusive", RecordType.Name = "MDP- ISP Non-Exclusive")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill in the Dedicated ph# before saving record.
